messages.subject: Tsuba added to my website
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Guys, I have just added 3 tsuba to my website in the fittings section. Please have a look. I will be adding many more items over the next few weeks as time
messages.messageBody:
Hi Guys,
I have just added 3 tsuba to my website in the fittings section.
Please have a look.

I will be adding many more items over the next few weeks as time
permits - so check back from time to time.

http://www.japaneseswordcollector.com/

Any information on the iron fittings would be appreciated.


Regards,
Louis
